ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides a comprehensive system for selecting variables and weighting data to match the specifications of the American National Election Studies. The package includes methods for identifying discrepant variables, raking data, and assessing the effects of the raking algorithm. It also allows automated re-raking if target variables fall outside identified bounds and allows greater user specification than other available raking algorithms. A variety of simple weighted statistics that were previously in this package (version .55 and earlier) have been moved to the package 'weights.'

Provides a comprehensive system for selecting variables and weighting data to match the specifications of the American National Election Studies. The package includes methods for identifying discrepant variables, raking data, and assessing the effects of the raking algorithm. It also allows automated re-raking if target variables fall outside identified bounds and allows greater user specification than other available raking algorithms. A variety of simple weighted statistics that were previously in this package (version .55 and earlier) have been moved to the package 'weights.'

name: r-anesrake
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.80' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-anesrake
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/anesrake_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/anesrake/anesrake_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d89c7b5ac7d587b11a743eb0923ffd59696508d77669451c6d2a4a8078284fdc

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-hmisc
    - r-weights
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-hmisc
    - r-weights

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('anesrake')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('anesrake')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=anesrake
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides a comprehensive system for selecting variables and weighting data to match
    the specifications of the American National Election Studies. The package includes
    methods for identifying discrepant variables, raking data, and assessing the effects
    of the raking algorithm. It also allows automated re-raking if target variables
    fall outside identified bounds and allows greater user specification than other
    available raking algorithms. A variety of simple weighted statistics that were previously
    in this package (version .55 and earlier) have been moved to the package 'weights.'
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - tobiasraabe

# Package: anesrake
# Version: 0.80
# Date: 2018-04-27
# Title: ANES Raking Implementation
# Author: Josh Pasek [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Josh Pasek <josh@joshpasek.com>
# Depends: Hmisc, weights
# Description: Provides a comprehensive system for selecting variables and weighting data to match the specifications of the American National Election Studies. The package includes methods for identifying discrepant variables, raking data, and assessing the effects of the raking algorithm. It also allows automated re-raking if target variables fall outside identified bounds and allows greater user specification than other available raking algorithms. A variety of simple weighted statistics that were previously in this package (version .55 and earlier) have been moved to the package 'weights.'
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyLoad: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-04-27 19:44:57 UTC; jpasek
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-04-28 09:23:18 UTC
